posts.author: Landeril
posts.content: I'm looking for a great fighter build that may or may not be able to wield some offensive magics. Can anyone help me out?

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
A rather broad brush you are using to paint this request. Some details would help, such as...
  • Level cap?[/*:m]
  • A server with customizations/nerfs or a vanilla build? For instance, is DevCrit viable?[/*:m]
  • If for a specific server, what is its name? [/*:m]
  • Are you comfortable with extensive buffing or just prefer a few offensive spells to toss around?[/*:m]
  • A skilled, dexterous character... or one with highest-damage and perhaps less skilled (i.e. stealth skills, trap skills, etc.)?[/*:m]
  • Any race, class or weapon preferences?[/*:m]
  • Single-handed w/shield or dual-wielder?[/*:m]
  • Some option with range attack or specifically melee-based?[/*:m]
  • Is experience penalty a major consideration?[/*:m]
[/list]

Battle clerics and arcane spellswords are popular catch-alls but you may have more definitive ideas of your own.

The more specific your request the faster and better will come useful responses and this IS the place to find them.

And Welcome to the ECB!

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Some builds that come to mind :

FTR 28/Bard 2/RDD 10: dedicated dev critter

Bard 16/FTR 14/RDD 10: dev critter, self buffer, bard song for self/party support and curse song to weaken enemies, taunt, UMD, some offensive spells, etc.

FTR 20/Bard 4/PM 16: dev critter with PM 10 immunities, great AC and epic spells on top (no ordinary casting power though).

Cleric 26/Bard 4/RDD 10: possibly the best batlle cleric out there, str based machine of destruction with clerical goodness

But then again, more info is necessary as Hip says. And welcome aboard.
